rp_all_applicants as rp_all_applicantsselect rp_all_applicants p.company_code, rp_all_applicants (select assoc.association_name from rp_all_applicants (select association_code, name as association_name from association where association_code not in (select c.company_code from company c, person p where c.person_id = p.person_id and (p.class_type = 'ASSN' or p.class_type = 'GRP')) rp_all_applicants union rp_all_applicants select c.company_code as association_code ,p.last_name as association_name from company c, person p where c.person_id = p.person_id and (p.class_type = 'ASSN' or p.class_type = 'GRP')) assoc rp_all_applicants where p.association_code = assoc.association_code) as association_name, rp_all_applicants icv.g_number, rp_all_applicants i.client_id, rp_all_applicants p.policy_number as case_number, rp_all_applicants p.alternate_case_id as alternate_case_number, rp_all_applicants p.receive_date, rp_all_applicants p.service_associate_id, rp_all_applicants i.last_name as applicant_last_name, rp_all_applicants i.first_name as applicant_first_name, rp_all_applicants i.tax_id as applicant_ssn, rp_all_applicants (select TOP 1 ps.tax_id from person ps, policy_person pp where ps.person_id = pp.person_id and pp.role_id = 'owner' and pp.policy_id = i.policy_id) as member_ssn, rp_all_applicants i.sex as gender, rp_all_applicants i.applicant_status as applicant_status_code, rp_all_applicants (select code_value from tl_code where language_code = 'en-us' and code_type = 'applicant_status' and code_id = i.applicant_status) as applicant_status, rp_all_applicants i.applicant_status_date, rp_all_applicants icv.amount as amount_applied_for, rp_all_applicants i.birth_date, rp_all_applicants (select pa.country_state_id from person_address pa rp_all_applicants where pa.address_type_code = 'RESIDENCE' rp_all_applicants and pa.person_id = i.person_id) as residence_state_id, rp_all_applicants (select ltrim(rtrim(cs.state_name)) + ' (' + ltrim(rtrim(cs.state_code)) + ')' from person_address pa, tl_country_state cs rp_all_applicants where (pa.address_type_code = 'RESIDENCE') rp_all_applicants and pa.person_id = i.person_id rp_all_applicants and cs.country_state_id = pa.country_state_id) as residence_state, rp_all_applicants icv.final_action_date, rp_all_applicants (select rp_all_applicants ltrim(rtrim(ps.last_name) + ', ' + rtrim(ps.first_name)) rp_all_applicants from rp_all_applicants person ps, aus_user u rp_all_applicants where rp_all_applicants u.person_id = ps.person_id and u.user_id = icv.final_action_by_id rp_all_applicants ) as final_action_by, rp_all_applicants icv.reason_text as final_action_reason, rp_all_applicants (select reason_code from tl_final_action_reason where reason_status = (select code_value from tl_code where language_code = 'en-us' and code_type = 'applicant_status' and code_id = icv.coverage_status) and reason_text = icv.reason_text) as reason_code, rp_all_applicants icv.plan_code_id, rp_all_applicants (select description from tl_plan_code where plan_code_id = icv.plan_code_id) as plan_code_description, rp_all_applicants-- icv.planned_premium, rp_all_applicants-- (select code_value from tl_acord_codes where code_type = 'Payment Mode' and code_id = p.payment_mode_code) as premium_mode, rp_all_applicants-- icv.web_quoted_class, rp_all_applicants-- (select rp_all_applicants-- description rp_all_applicants-- from rp_all_applicants-- ta_rate_table_class rp_all_applicants-- where rp_all_applicants-- rulebook_id = rp_all_applicants-- (select top 1 rulebook_id from rulebook_view where plan_code_id = icv.plan_code_id and ((association_code = p.association_code) or (p.association_code is null)) and (type = 0 or type is null)) and sequence_no = icv.rate_class_quoted) as applied_for_rp_all_applicantsrate_class, rp_all_applicants-- (select rp_all_applicants-- description rp_all_applicants-- from rp_all_applicants-- ta_rate_table_class rp_all_applicants-- where rp_all_applicants-- rulebook_id = rp_all_applicants-- (select top 1 rulebook_id from rulebook_view where plan_code_id = icv.plan_code_id and ((association_code = p.association_code) or (p.association_code is null)) and (type = 0 or type is null)) and sequence_no = icv.rate_class_approved) as system_recrp_all_applicantsommended_rate_class, rp_all_applicants-- (select rp_all_applicants-- description rp_all_applicants-- from rp_all_applicants-- ta_rate_table_class rp_all_applicants-- where (p.association_code is null)) and (type = 0 or type is null)) and sequence_no = icv.rate_class_issued) as rate_class_arp_all_applicantspproved, rp_all_applicants icv.approved_amount as issued_amount, rp_all_applicants (SELECT TOP 1 effective_date FROM coverage_person_insured as cpi where cpi.policy_person_id = icv.policy_person_id) as effective_date, rp_all_applicants (SELECT top 1 ltrim(rtrim(p.last_name)) from coverage_person_reinsurer as cpr rp_all_applicants inner join company as c on cpr.company_code = c.company_code rp_all_applicants inner join coverage_person as cp on cpr.coverage_person_id = cp.coverage_person_id rp_all_applicants inner join policy_person as pp on pp.person_id = cp.person_id rp_all_applicants inner join person as p on p.person_id = c.person_id rp_all_applicants where pp.policy_person_id = icv.policy_person_id) as reinsurer_name, rp_all_applicants (SELECT top 1 cpr.reinsurance_amount FROM coverage_person_reinsurer as cpr inner join coverage_person as cp on cpr.coverage_person_id = cp.coverage_person_id inner join policy_person as pp on pp.person_id = cp.person_id where pp.policy_person_id = icv.prp_all_applicantsolicy_person_id) as reinsurance_amount, rp_all_applicants icv.perm_table_rating as table_rating, rp_all_applicants icv.perm_flat_extra_amount as flat_extra_amount, rp_all_applicants-- p.cwa_amount, rp_all_applicants
